name: Batter Fry
author: Rebecca Hooper
instructions: Combine flour, egg, milk, baking powder and salt to make the batter. Beat until smooth. Cover and let stand at least 15 minutes before using. Dip your choice of vegetable into the batter. Let the sur- plus drain off. Deep fry at 350Â° until brown and crisp.This can be used for any vegetable, for example, green peppers, onion rings, and mushrooms.
